name: Thunderbird for Windows 8\10
description: Gets Thunderbird more fit with Windows 8 and Windows 10 looks - sharper tabs, fewer gradients. Customizable.
additional_info: Backgrounds (colors\gradients\images) and border colors can be set in the first section of CSS. Unfortunately, userstyles.org currently does not have support for CSS property\custom code type settings, so these can only be adjusted manually (or made into a private userstyle applied on top of this one). The userstyle should be fairly compatible with other userstyles, as it touches only what it has to (tabs and toolbox), and does that carefully. Themes are supported and have separate settings (just in case). Can be considered a companion style to my similar userstyle for Firefox.
